It is characterized by its tall, erect stem and large, showy flowers that range in color from red to orange. The plant has palmate leaves that are deeply lobed, and it produces capsule fruits that contain numerous seeds. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, often growing in dry, open habitats.
